about_the_game:
Operate Your Vending Machines

Your mission is to strategically place vending machines throughout the dungeon, stocking them with various items from basic supplies to rare, powerful gear. By carefully choosing and stocking items, you’ll earn a steady income to reinvest in upgrading your machines and products, allowing your profits to keep growing.

A Relaxed, Idle Game for Easy Income

This is a fully idle game where you simply stock items and watch as the income flows in. As time goes on, adventurers will keep coming to your vending machines, providing you with a constant stream of revenue.

Upgrade and Expand

With enough income, you can buy higher-grade vending machines, add more item types, and even expand to key spots in the dungeon. With each upgrade, your profits will multiply, ultimately allowing you to dominate the dungeon’s economy.

Become an Indispensable Force Over Time

Adventurers will rely on your supplies to boost their strength and survival odds, while you, from a humble vending operator, will gradually become an irreplaceable force in the dungeon. Each stocking decision will impact your fortune, and soon, you’ll rule the economic landscape of this ancient dungeon.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Dungeon Vending Machines Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dungeon Vending Machines is a relaxing, casual idle game. Where you run vending machines in a dungeon! As adventurers brave dangerous depths, you’ll be their lifeline. Expand your machine lineup, grow your profits, and become the ultimate dungeon supplier!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
